alert.note: Alert for Menominee (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 15 at 4:28AM EST until November 16 at 1:00AM EST by NWS Marquette
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 1 PM THIS AFTERNOON TO 1 AM EST WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of 3 to 5 inches in the southern half of the county and 1 to 3 inches in the northern half of the county during the advisory period. Warmer temperatures close to the Bay of Green Bay could limit accumulations along the immediate lakeshore. * WHERE...Menominee County. * WHEN...From 1 PM Tuesday to 1 AM EST Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. The hazardous conditions could impact the evening commute. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Light snow can be expected this morning but the more intense snowfall will occur during the advisory timeframe.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
